data.message: Glassmorphism 100% Match Formula - Use exactly 3 visible circles (not diffused blobs): 1) Dark blob top-left (620x620, positioned -320,-320) for curved shadow, 2) Red circle top-right (850x850, positioned 320,-250) curving down, 3) Red circle bottom-center (950x950, positioned -150,300) creating the prominent red glow. This gives 3D depth and space. Do NOT add extra circles - simplicity creates the illusion.
